name: SParatyphiInfectionTestsForSParatyphiAntibody
title: S. Paratyphi Infection (Tests for S. Paratyphi Antibody)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of S. Paratyphi antibodies.),(Data Element Scope: Organism names or substances reported in laboratory results),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Salmonella Paratyphi Ab;),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
